attributes.action: Mps to cut their salaries rather than increasing national insurance for all
attributes.additional_details: People can not afford anymore tax increases, mps are funded by the tax payer and they are way above the average pay and then have expenses on top of that, pay for your own travel, you chose to work in that location, if it was a private company they wouldn't pay for your travel and costs for a second home
attributes.background: Mps should cut their salaries / expenses rather than increasing tax and national insurance for all, many people can't afford this

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
